info.abstract:
[Behaviour] Look for a pattern of bit inside the measure. It creates an array of indexes pointing to the first bit of any occurrence found.
[Parameters] - input data type : not used. - output data type : not used. - measure : input measure. - pattern : search pattern string.
[Return type] Binary-array.
[Examples] Find occurrences of the pattern '010101'. oph_bit_find('','',bit_measure,'010101')
